targets.query: select utime + stime as total_cpu from (select non_negative_derivative(min("user-time"), 1s) as utime, non_negative_derivative(min("system-time"), 1s) as stime from "nom-link.server.usage" where "host-name"=~ /^($hostname)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)) where $timeFilter

select utime + stime as grouper_cpu from (select non_negative_derivative(min("thread-groups.grouper.user-time"), 1s) as utime, non_negative_derivative(min("thread-groups.grouper.system-time"), 1s) as stime from "nom-link.server.usage" where "host-name"=~ /^($hostname)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)) where $timeFilter

select utime + stime as kafka_cpu from (select non_negative_derivative(min("thread-groups.kafka.user-time"), 1s) as utime, non_negative_derivative(min("thread-groups.kafka.system-time"), 1s) as stime from "nom-link.server.usage" where "host-name"=~ /^($hostname)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)) where $timeFilter

select utime + stime as kafka_consumer_cpu from (select non_negative_derivative(min("thread-groups.in.user-time"), 1s) as utime, non_negative_derivative(min("thread-groups.in.system-time"), 1s) as stime from "nom-link.server.usage" where "host-name"=~ /^($hostname)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)) where $timeFilter

select utime + stime as time_cpu from (select non_negative_derivative(min("thread-groups.time.user-time"), 1s) as utime, non_negative_derivative(min("thread-groups.time.system-time"), 1s) as stime from "nom-link.server.usage" where "host-name"=~ /^($hostname)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)) where $timeFilter

select utime + stime as default_cpu from (select non_negative_derivative(min("thread-groups.default.user-time"), 1s) as utime, non_negative_derivative(min("thread-groups.default.system-time"), 1s) as stime from "nom-link.server.usage" where "host-name"=~ /^($hostname)$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)) where $timeFilter

list.name: hostname
list.query: show tag values from "nom-link.server.information" with key = "host-name"
